attributes.action: allow people in receipt of incapacity benefit to receive free prescriptions and dental treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, people who are unable to work and who are in receipt of incapacity benefit do not qualify for free medical prescriptions or free dental treatment. However, those on job seekers allowance do. This inequality means that people who cannot work - through no choice of their own - end up worse off than those who are able to, but find themselves out of work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
